author: Natalie Andrews
title: Mississippi Lawmaker Chris McDaniel Enters GOP Primary Race for U.S. Senate Seat
text:
Republican Chris McDaniel entered the Mississippi GOP primary Senate race Wednesday, setting up another challenge to a Republican incumbent as the party seeks to maintain its slim control of the Senate.

Mr. McDaniel will take on Sen. Roger Wicker, Mississippiâ€™s junior senator. The state senator became a favorite among conservatives angry with the GOP establishment in 2014, when he took on longtime Republican Sen. Thad Cochran. He forced the race to a runoff, which Mr. Cochran narrowly won after his campaign urged Democrats...
